common.amountGreaterThanBalance: The amount must be less than or equal to your balance.

auth.pleaseEnterYourPasswordAgain: Please enter your passcode once again.
auth.biometricAuthentication.description: Authenticate using the fingerprint or facial recognition.

start.createYourWallet.description: Create your wallet now and get involved.
start.newSeedPhrase.description: Below is the new seed phrase for your account. Save them somewhere safe and secret.
start.confirmSeedPhrase.description: Input seed phrase that was generated before. It consists of 12 words.
start.complete.description: Your wallet has been created. Start using AliceFi by clicking the button below.
start.importSeedPhrase.description: Input existing seed phrase. It consists of 12 words.
start.inputSeedPhraseNotice:
All words are in lower case.
Each word is separated by a space.

home.title: 홈
home.description: AliceFi 지갑으로 암호화폐를 가지고 와서 저축을 시작해보세요!
home.pendingAmount.eth.step2: 이더리움 입금이 확인되었습니다. 'DAI로 변환하기'를 누르면 수수료 지갑에 입금될 0.01 ETH를 제외한 나머지 금액이 DAI로 변환됩니다.
home.pendingAmount.eth.step2.inProgress: 이더리움을 DAI로 바꾸기 위한 트랜잭션이 기록되고 있습니다. 이 단계 이후에 DAI 가져오기를 완료해주세요.
home.pendingAmount.eth.done: DAI로 변환이 완료되었습니다. DAI 가져오기를 진행해주세요.
home.pendingAmount.erc20.step2.inProgress: 2단계 진행 중입니다. 이더리움 네트워크 상황에 따라 15초 - 1분 정도 소요됩니다.
home.pendingAmount.erc20.step3.inProgress: 3단계 진행 중입니다. 이더리움 네트워크 상황에 따라 15초 - 1분 정도 소요됩니다.
home.pendingAmount.erc20.step4.inProgress: 4단계 진행 중입니다. 이더리움 블록 15개 확정을 기다리고 있습니다. (4분 가량 소요)
home.pendingAmount.erc20.done: AliceFi 지갑으로 가져오는 모든 단계가 완료되었습니다.
home.pendingAmount.erc20.notEnoughFee: {{symbol}}을 가져오기 위한 수수료(ETH)가 부족합니다. 우선 0.01 ETH를 입금해주세요.
home.receive.step2: AliceFi 지갑으로 가져올 암호화폐를 아래의 주소로 송금해주세요. AliceFi 지갑에서 자동으로 DAI로 변환됩니다.

exchange.title: Exchanges
exchange.description: Below is a list of exchanges for DAI token. After purchasing assets and transferring them to 'My Ethereum Address', you can use them in AliceFi.
exchange.popularTokens.description: Most actively traded tokens for the last 24 hours.

trade.wouldYouCancelYourOrder: Would you cancel your order? You cannot undo this after done.
trade.orderCancelFailure: Failure cancelling your order. Please try again.
trade.clickUnsettledOrderToCancel: Click unsettled orders to cancel them.

profile.myAddress.description: Send yours assets to 'My Ethereum Address' and check it in AliceFi.
profile.addressCopiedToTheClipboard: 'My Ethereum Address' is copied to the clipboard.
profile.backupSeedPhrase.description: If you ever change your mobile device, you will need this seed phrase to access your accounts. Save them somewhere safe and secret.
profile.backupSeedPhrase.warning: DO NOT share this phrase with anyone. These words can be used to steal all account.
profile.seedPhraseCopiedToTheClipboard: Your seed phrase is copied to the clipboard.
profile.resetAccount.description: All information for my account is wiped out.
profile.resetAccount.requirement: To reset the account, you need to type in your seed phrase. Back it up before reset.
profile.resetAccount.warning: This is an irreversible action. If you didn't backup your seed words, all your assets will be out of control!
profile.createWallet.description: Create your wallet now and get involved!
profile.customerSupport.description: This will redirect you to our telegram channel.
profile.name: Name

ifo.title: Earn Free ALICE
ifo.description: Deposit DAI stable coins and earn equivalent amount of ALICE tokens every 24 hours!

savings.title: Savings
savings.description: DAI is a stable coin that holds a dollar value. Exchange Ethereum for DAI now to save and earn daily interest and ALICE token rewards!
savings.start.description: A small amount of ETH (less than 0.1) and DAI is required to use AliceFi's services.
savings.newSavings.note: * You can withdraw your deposits at any time.
savings.simulation.description: Transfer in cryptocurrency to AliceFi Wallet and start savings!
savings.simulation.input: Enter the amount you want to deposit to get the expected return.
savings.startSavings.description: Enter the amount you want to deposit for savings.
savings.startSavings.description.withoutDai: Transfer in cryptocurrency to AliceFi Wallet and start savings!
savings.startSavings.note: * The interest rate may change due to market conditions.
savings.savingsFailure: Failure starting savings. Please try again.
savings.withdrawSavings.description: You can withdraw some or all amounts.
savings.withdrawSavings.confirm: Your interest will start to accrue after 24 hours if you withdraw now. Would you withdraw?
savings.loan.description: Deposit tokens as collateral which you believe whose price will increase and you will get paid for your DAI stable coins.
savings.recentClaims.description: Other users are claiming rewards too.

update.title: There is an essential update
update.description: The app will restart for the update. The update can take tens of seconds.

not-connected.title: Not Connected :(
not-connected.description: Check your WIFI or mobile connectivity and restart the app.
